font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 应得的，恰当的：deserved, appropriate
【例】condign punishment 应得的惩罚
【例】A suspension停职 without pay is condign punishment for breaking the company's code of business ethics
【近】due, deserved, merited['merɪtɪd, justified, warranted
【反】undeserved, undue, unmerited 不应得的
【记】 con + dignity 大家都有面子，适宜的
